abstract: Dallas Cowboys wide receiver Dez Bryant misses start of mandatory minicamp.
lead_paragraph: Coach Jason Garrett did not seem concerned about threats that Bryant was willing to sit out regular-season games without a new long-term contract.

headline.main: Dez Bryant Out of Cowboys’ Minicamp

snippet: Coach Jason Garrett did not seem concerned about threats that Bryant was willing to sit out regular-season games without a new long-term contract.
